title: BARD - Murdaugh, Heard & Drones
itunes:title: BARD - Murdaugh, Heard & Drones
description: Mark and Gary connect on a Sunday to discuss the latests in the Johnny Depp Amber Heard trial, including some fun the internet is having. They also give an update on the ongoing Murdaugh case out of South Carolina and highlight a recent New Yorker article as they attempt to highlight a new angle.
content:encoded: Mark and Gary connect on a Sunday to discuss the latests in the Johnny Depp Amber Heard trial, including some fun the internet is having. They also give an update on the ongoing Murdaugh case out of South Carolina and highlight a recent New Yorker article as they attempt to highlight a new angle.
